FuncDef: This command configures the transport address to be used when setting up the LDP TCP sessions. The transport address can be configured asinterfaceorsystem. The transport address can be configured globally (applies to all LDP interfaces) or per interface. The most specific value is used.

ParaDef.Info: The IP interface address is used to set up the LDP session between neighbors. The transport address interface cannot be used if multiple interfaces exist between two neighbors, since only one LDP session is set up between two neighbors.
The system IP address is used to set up the LDP session between neighbors.

ExtraInfo: Default: system - The system IP address is used.
